first.title: Tavelling
first.content: One of my favourite things to do is travel around the world. It's crazy to think that we have 7,100 islands and only a few. The plan is hopefully soon after graduation, I can work online while travelling with the family to sustain my financial needs but it's too good to be true I think :D.

second.title: Waching Movies
second.content: I love watching movies and TV series in my leisure time. Back in my days, I have this complication of movies and TV series on my portable hard drives but not thanks to Netflix and other platforms you don't need to download anymore.

third.title: Online games
third.content: Before, I use to be a professional gamer. I join tournaments like starcraft and warcraft. But now, I like playing with my friends casually online.

fourth.title: Titel 4
fourth.content: Before, I use to be a professional gamer. I join tournaments like starcraft and warcraft. But now, I like playing with my friends casually online.
